long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly remove backgrounds in Canva with one click.

Detailed Description:

Canva Automation Tool: Background Remover is your ultimate productivity companion designed to streamline and enhance your experience on Canva. Whether you are a designer, marketer, or anyone who frequently uses Canva, this extension will save you time and effort by automating the tedious task of background removal. With a simple and intuitive interface, you can initiate complex sequences of actions with just a single click.

Key Features:

Automate Background Removal: Automatically click through all elements and remove backgrounds from images without manual intervention.
Seamless Integration: Easily integrates into your Canva workflow. Just install the extension, and you’re ready to automate.
Customizable Automation: Start the automation process by clicking the "Run Automate" button, conveniently positioned at the center bottom of your screen.
